data.text:
Friday Night Lights with Flower the Hummingbird. 📸: @wolf.353 ⁠
⁠
Can you guess what destination the backdrop is? Hint: It's dubbed as "America's Friendliest Airport."⁠

Get away this weekend with Frontier! https://t.co/8p3D40aBkl https://t.co/dYMf7Yjqha

@GreenZoneHero Hi, The issue with the face mask had nothing to do with the American flag emblem. The agent believed the passenger’s gaiter-style mask was not permissible. At Frontier, we value, respect and treasure the American flag.  ^BW

data.text:
With the expected impact to travel conditions from Hurricanes Marco and Laura along the Louisiana Gulf Coast, Frontier has enacted guidelines for travel between 8/24 - 8/27 to/from/through

- New Orleans, LA (MSY)
- Houston Bush Intercontinental, TX (IAH)

https://t.co/K0fuLM9eOs https://t.co/h5ZvoJEAVV

Congratulations are in order for Captain Elyse Swedberg! She was one of over 300 women nominated for this year‘s @denbizjournal's, Outstanding Women in Business awards. She was selected Winner of the Large Business category! We are so thankful to have her on team Frontier! https://t.co/i7IjjWr8Jn

Team Frontier spent the day volunteering alongside @projectcure to help sort, process and prepare donated medical products for international distribution to assist children, families, individuals and communities in over 130 countries.  

Volunteer here: https://t.co/LwuBB7UvwE https://t.co/KJ8WVQXjcw

data.text:
Every day our Frontier ramp teams go above and beyond in picking up (foreign object debris - trash) from the ramp, taxiways and runways. This is done pre-arrival and pre-departure on every flight. Safety is of utmost importance!

Thank you so much to our airport team members! https://t.co/VfOBsW8jcM

I think we can all cheers to this sale! FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY - 100% off your ticket price!*

Book NOW before the clock runs out at 5PM MST! Use promo code: FLASH at check out. https://t.co/gXWDyyj5Xv

*Seats are limited. Restrictions apply. https://t.co/8T4QavMLiZ

Happy #NationalAviationDay from team Frontier! Since 1903 (thank you Wright Brothers), aviation has changed the way we see the world. It brings us closer together while allowing us to go further than we ever thought possible.

How has aviation changed your life? https://t.co/8RdWLotMPf

SAVE UP TO $50* OFF! Why put miles on your car when you can fly the skies and be at your destination (drink in hand) already! Plus put those miles in your FREE Frontier Miles account. https://t.co/bk2WJG5hR7

Use Promo Code: BOOKNOW at checkout. Book now: https://t.co/KjrhcXKWkj https://t.co/6HlwsgZgXF

data.text:

📸: Airbus⁠

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Otto the Owl might be a hoot, but not wearing a mask is no laughing matter! 

With your help, we can fly healthy together and prevent the spread of COVID-19. 

Learn more about Frontier's commitment to your health and safety: https://t.co/OWEZTfXQdS https://t.co/owu6aqd9sD

Frontier team members recently volunteered at the @FoodBankRockies! 

Please visit https://t.co/pWwuH3Out4 for more information on volunteering  or check out a local food bank in your neck of the woods! https://t.co/Qmjh9B4Qs0
